root: ^Hola, debes de ser [player_name]. [grandkid_name] me dijo que estarías por aquí.

s: ^Hola. I still have to work on my Spanish skills

c-1: ^Oh, my bad. [grandkid_name] did not tell me you don’t speak Spanish. I said that [grandkid_name] told me you’d be around. What brings you to my little store?
